price: We will surely make those who disbelieve taste a severe punishment, and We will surely recompense them according to the worst of what they used to do.
arabic: فَلَنُذِيقَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ عَذَابٗا شَدِيدٗا وَلَنَجۡزِيَنَّهُمۡ أَسۡوَأَ ٱلَّذِي كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ
